title: Design Thinking-Based Online Science Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Develops design thinking competencies through non-real-time collaborative problem-solving in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex scientific problems and derive human-centered solutions.
Learners can share ideas and provide feedback with peers using LMS-based collaborative tools.
Learners experience the scientific problem-solving process through a prototype creation-testing-improvement cycle.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
